t: Forged Iron Hardware - Lee Valley Tools
s: Designed to emulate early American forged hardware, this series is typical of the hardware used in the 17th and 18th centuries. The "smooth" iron hardware has no texturing, while the "rough" iron hardware is textured to look weathered and corroded.
